name: ingestr
title: bruin-data.github.io/ingestr
payoff: Copy data between any source and destination
shortDescription: ingestr is a versatile command-line tool designed for data professionals. It facilitates the transfer of data from any source to any destination database efficiently. Users can perform both full-refresh and incremental data loads using a single command. This tool is ideal for database administrators and developers who need to regularly update or migrate data across various database systems.
pros: Supports multiple source and destination databases
Supports both full-refresh and incremental loading
cons: Command-line interface may not be user-friendly for all
Lack of a graphical user interface
Potential compatibility issues with less common databases

aiSuggestedAlternatives.name: Talend
aiSuggestedAlternatives.reason: Offers a graphical interface and rich features.
